## Erc20.setAllowance() method

Allows the specified `spender` wallet to transfer the given `amount` of tokens to another wallet

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setAllowance(spender: string, amount: BigNumber): Promise<TransactionResult>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  spender | string |  |
|  amount | BigNumber |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;TransactionResult&gt;

## Example


```javascript
// Address of the wallet to allow transfers from
const spenderAddress = "0x...";

// The number of tokens to give as allowance
const amount = 100

await contract.setAllowance(spenderAddress, amount);
```
